movies.title: The Left-Hand Side of the Fridge
movies.plot: Christophe agrees to be filmed by his roommate Stéphane, while he is searching for a meaningful engineering job. Since he voluntarily resigned his job when he was to be moved to quality control, he does not get unemployment benefits, and goes to classes on how to contest the decision. Christophe sells his car, while Stéphane receives more funding for the film, and can hire a sound man. However, the crew following Christophe with a camera is a hinderance in his job-hunting. After spending the night with Christophe, his girlfriend Odile, an artist working as a supermarket cashier, takes over the camera and films the roommates as they get up. Finally Christophe finds a few days work dismantling machines for a company that is moving to Mexico, but his cameraman causes problems after interviewing the president of the company in the washroom.

biography.bio: Paul Ahmarani was born in 1972 in Québec, Canada. He is an actor, known for Upside Down (2012), The Left-Hand Side of the Fridge (2000) and Congorama (2006).
biography.name: Paul Ahmarani

biography.bio: Stéphane Demers was born in 1966 in Montréal, Québec, Canada. He is an actor, known for Aviator (2004), Trudeau II: Maverick in the Making (2005) and Monsieur Lazhar (2011).
biography.name: Stéphane Demers

biography.bio: Geneviève Néron was born on July 24, 1974. She is an actress, known for The Left-Hand Side of the Fridge (2000), Soowitch (2001) and Motel Pluton (2010).
biography.name: Geneviève Néron

biography.bio: Jules Philip is an actor, known for Monsieur Lazhar (2011), It's Not Me, I Swear! (2008) and The Left-Hand Side of the Fridge (2000).
biography.name: Jules Philip

biography.bio: Alexandrine Agostini is known for her work on Seducing Doctor Lewis (2003), The Left-Hand Side of the Fridge (2000) and The Woman Who Drinks (2001).
biography.name: Alexandrine Agostini

biography.bio: Michel Laperrière was born on June 3, 1958. He is an actor and director, known for C.R.A.Z.Y. (2005), Café de Flore (2011) and The Left-Hand Side of the Fridge (2000).
biography.name: Michel Laperrière

biography.bio: Marie-Andrée Corneille is an actress, known for The Left-Hand Side of the Fridge (2000), Erreur sur la personne (1996) and Sous un ciel variable (1995).
biography.name: Marie-Andrée Corneille

biography.bio: Stéphane Crête was born on September 19, 1967 as Yves-Stéphane Crête. He is an actor and writer, known for Dans une galaxie près de chez vous (1999), Dans une galaxie près de chez vous - Le film (2004) and The Left-Hand Side of the Fridge (2000).
biography.name: Stéphane Crête

biography.bio: Khanh Hua is an actor, known for Lilies (1996), The Left-Hand Side of the Fridge (2000) and Maelstrom (2000).
biography.name: Khanh Hua

biography.bio: Sylvain Bellemare was born on February 20, 1968 in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. He is known for his work on Arrival (2016), Incendies (2010) and It's Not Me, I Swear! (2008).
biography.name: Sylvain Bellemare

biography.bio: Elyzabeth Walling is an actress, known for Braquages (2001), New Gold Dream (1995) and The Left-Hand Side of the Fridge (2000).
biography.name: Elyzabeth Walling

biography.bio: Robert Morin was born in 1949 in Montréal, Québec, Canada. He is a director and writer, known for The Negro (2002), 3 histoires d'Indiens (2014) and Requiem pour un beau sans-coeur (1992).
biography.name: Robert Morin

biography.bio: Daniel Brière is an actor, known for Caméra café (2002), The Barbarian Invasions (2003) and The Decline of the American Empire (1986).
biography.name: Daniel Brière

biography.bio: Ginette Boivin is an actress, known for Le crime d'Ovide Plouffe (1984), 2 Seconds (1998) and Amnésie: L'énigme James Brighton (2005).
biography.name: Ginette Boivin

biography.bio: Noel Burton is an actor, known for Gothika (2003), A Silent Love (2004) and The Art of War (2000).
biography.name: Noel Burton

titlesAwards.titleAwardOutcome: Won Best Canadian First Feature Film
